Aromatherapy Diffuser: A vase can be used as an aromatherapy diffuser by filling it with water and a few drops of essential oils. The water can be heated, and the essential oils can be diffused into the air, creating a calming and relaxing atmosphere.
Candle Holder: A vase can be used as a candle holder by placing a candle inside and placing it on a table or shelf. The vase can add a touch of elegance and sophistication to the room.

Wind Chime: A vase can be used as a wind chime by adding small objects such as beads or shells to the vase and hanging it outside. The wind will cause the objects to make a soothing sound, creating a peaceful and calming ambiance.

Planter Box: A vase can be used as a planter box by removing the bottom of the vase and filling it with soil. A small plant or herb can be placed in the soil, and the vase can be used to hold the plant upright.
Vase Light: A vase can be used as a vase light by adding a small LED light inside the vase. The light can be turned on and off, creating a unique and eye-catching display.
